'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

== Background==
Perched at the top of the mountain, Serpent's Crown is the richest and most beautiful district in Neketaka, housing the Kahanga Palace, the seat of power of [[Queen Onekaza II]] and the [[Huana]].

==Points of interest==
* The area is large, divided into two halves: The outer district and the palace, joined together by bridges spanning the distance between the two mountains. [[Una]] the merchant is located at the entrance plaza on the outer side, with three estates located along the rim ([[Lady Epero's Estate]] - locked and accessible during her [[Bounty - Lady Epero|bounty]], [[Muhai's Estate]], and [[Takano's Estate]]).
* The palace side holds the [[Kahanga Palace]].

==Characters==
* [[Nungata]], has a few bounties up for offer.
* [[Netehe]], involved in the quest [[The Archmage's Vault]].
* [[Captain Teryc Lofell]], a Principi captain with a missing crew.
* [[Geirvard Calder]], offers training (+1 [[History]], +1 [[Arcana]]) for {{cp2|3000}}
;Merchants
* [[Ereti]]: A merchant that sells a variety of pets.
* [[Una]]: A gemstone merchant.

==Pets==
* [[Prissy]] - "Stray Cat": On the Kahanga Palace rooftop balcony.
